PI.name: Roelof de Jong
PI.desc: Dr. de Jong is the Principle Investigator of the GHOSTS project, and leads the Milky Way and Local Volume group at the AIP.

members.name: Eric Bell
members.desc: Prof. Bell is a Professor at the University of Michigan.

members.name: Jeremy Bailin
members.desc: Dr. Bailin is an Associate Professor at the University of Alabama.

members.name: Antonela Monachesi
members.desc: Dr. Monachesi is an Assistant Professor at the University of La Serena.

members.name: In Sung Jang
members.desc: Dr. Jang is a postdoctoral scholar at the University of Chicago.

members.name: Benne W. Holwerda
members.desc: Dr. Holwerda is a postdoctoral researcher at Leiden Observatory in the Netherlands.

members.name: Adam Smercina
members.desc: Dr. Smercina is a postdoctoral research fellow at the University of Washington.

members.name: Richard D'Souza
members.desc: Dr. D'Souza is a staff astronomer at the Vatican Observatory.

formers.name: Thomas Brown
formers.desc: Dr. Brown is an Assoicate Astronomer at the Space Telescope Science Institute.

formers.name: James Bullock
formers.desc: Prof. Bullock is a Professor at the University of California, Irvine.
